getActiveCertification

Certification getActiveCertification(Currency currency,
                                     Member buyer,
                                     Member issuer)
Returns:
the unique active certification to the tuple (buyer, issuer, currency)

getCertificationIssuers

java.util.List<Member> getCertificationIssuers(PaymentObligation paymentObligation)
Returns:
the members (Issuers) who have an (unique) active certification issued to the specified payment obligation's buyer and with the payment obligation's currency.

getUsedAmount

java.math.BigDecimal getUsedAmount(Certification certification,
                                   boolean includePendingGuarantees)
Parameters:
includePendingGuarantees - if true include the pending guarantees in the used amount
Returns:
the used certification amount according to the associated guarantees
